YARP telemetry
==============

[![YARP homepage](https://img.shields.io/badge/YARP-Yet_Another_Robot_Platform-19c2d8.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](http://www.yarp.it/)

This is the telemetry component for YARP.
